item.name: Lesson 1.2: Testing Signing In to Acumatica ERP with Basic Authorization

response.name: Example
response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<service xml:base="http://localhost/MyStoreInstance/odata/" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2007/app" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <workspace>
        <atom:title type="text">Default</atom:title>

            <atom:title type="text">BI-Employees</atom:title>

        <collection href="BI-Dates">
            <atom:title type="text">BI-Dates</atom:title>
        </collection>

        </collection>

        </collection>
        <collection href="BI-Customers">
            <atom:title type="text">BI-Customers</atom:title>
        </collection>
        <collection href="Item%20Availability%20Data">

        <collection href="Modified%20Stock%20Items">

        <collection href="Stock%20Item%20Attachments">

        </collection>
        <collection href="Customer%20Contacts">
            <atom:title type="text">Customer Contacts</atom:title>
        </collection>
    </workspace>
</service>

item.name: Lesson 2.2: Retrieving the Quantities of Stock Items

item.name: Part 3: Retrieval of the Delta of Records
Lesson 3.1: Retrieving the Names of the Fields

response.name: Example
response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<edmx:Edmx Version="1.0" xmlns:edmx="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ado/2007/06/edmx">
    <edmx:DataServices m:DataServiceVersion="3.0" m:MaxDataServiceVersion="3.0" xmlns:m="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ado/2007/08/dataservices/metadata">
        <Schema Namespace="PX.Data" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ado/2009/11/edm">

            <EntityType Name="BI-Dates">

item.name: Lesson 3.1: Retrieving the List of Modified Stock Items

query.value: ItemStatus eq 'Active' and LastModifiedOn gt datetime'2018-11-12T00:00:00.000'
ItemStatus eq 'Active' and LastModifiedOn gt datetime'2018-11-12T00:00:00.000'
